sentences.sContent: More and more firms are floundering because of the recession.
sentences.sCn: 由于经济衰退，越来越多的公司举步维艰。

synos.tran: 挣扎，折腾；错乱地做事或说话

remMethod.val: 他发现 (found) 前方有很多障碍， 他只能困难地往前走 → 困难地往前走

words.tran: 挣脱；挣扎；衣裙上的荷边装饰

trans.tranCn: 挣扎，困难地往前走；笨拙而错乱地说或做事
trans.tranOther: to have a lot of problems and be likely to fail completely
a European flatfish, Platichthys flesus having a greyish-brown body covered with prickly scales: family Pleuronectidae: an important food fish
